title: Eikōn tou thēriou, or, The image of the beast shewing by a paralell scheme what a conformist the Church of Rome is to the pagan, and what a nonconformist to the Christian church in i'ts [sic] rites, service and ceremonys, the better to exemplify the true and false church / by T.D.
author: De Laune, Thomas, d. 1685.
notes: Attributed to Thomas De Laune. Cf. Wing; NUC pre-1956. Sometimes also ascribed to Thomas Danson. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Also published as part of A plea for the non-conformists (Wing D893).
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
